front.title: Signaling BFD configuration for a backup path in an FRR environment

abstract.t: Today there is no support in the RSVP protocol to dynamically signalthe enabling and configuring of the BFD (Bi-directional ForwardingDetection) on a backup path. This document introduces a new RSVPobject called "FRR backup BFD object". The procedures described inthis document are only applicable to Fast Reroute LSPs [RFC4090].
